attributes.action: Provide tests for  Coronavirus (Covid-19) in the UK
attributes.additional_details: The World Health Organisation has recommended testing, other countries have a programme in place - why haven't we (the UK) ? I personally do not believe we can get a true picture of the spread of the virus without it and the benefits are obvious - people are much more likely to self isolate if they test positive for the virus, thus hopefully limiting the spread.
attributes.background: Testing for Covid 19 should be made available to all those who wish to undergo such tests with immediate or soonest effect.
